sec.div: Additional information on select sensitivity analyses
sec.p: The Supplementary Information contains additional information on the co-optimization of air quality and climate policies (Supplementary Note 1 and Supplementary Fig. 8), life-year monetization and valuation (Supplementary Note 2), integrating the FAIR climate module into RICE + AIR (Supplementary Note 3), and the development of FUND + AIR (Supplementary Note 4).
